0.title: Sony A VAIO VGN-AW31M H Grey 46 7 cm (18 4&quot;) 1680 x 945 pixels Intel® Core™2 Duo 4 GB DDR2-SDRAM 500 GB Windows Vista Home Premium
0.longdesc: High Definition Entertainment<br/> With a Blu-ray Disc Drive or Blu-ray Disc Combo Drive on all models, AW-Series is designed to take full advantage of a new era in High Definition entertainment. Most models feature an integrated Blu-ray Disc Drive with read and write capability. This allows high bandwidth playback of latest HD movies plus creation and editing of your own productions filmed on an HD camcorder.<br/>  You can also store up to 50GB of multimedia data on one disc using the Blu-ray Disc Drive, as well as play and record all CD and DVD formats.<br/>  Home Theater Sound Quality<br/> Enjoy superb 2.1 channel sound performance with the VAIO AW-Series. These VAIOs feature an integrated subwoofer for impressive bass, specially designed PC speakers for natural mid to high frequency sound and an on board Sound Reality Chip.<br/> Also featured is Dolby Home Theatre for powerful virtual surround. Dolby Home Theater includes advanced audio technologies to place you right at the heart of the action for a true cinema-at-home experience. Optical out sockets allow easy connection to Home Cinema systems.<br/>  Watch & record TV<br/> Enjoying all your favourite TV programmes is effortless with the VGN-AW11XU (RXU). This model features an integrated hybrid digital and analogue TV tuner with remote control for convenient television viewing on your laptop. Watch, record and store analogue or high quality digital terrestrial TV programmes.<br/> Search available stations for favourite shows and record them while you’re out. If you come back before the show has finished, you can start watching while your AW-Series continues recording. Using multimedia features in Windows Vista, organise and manage all your recorded TV shows and enjoy them at your leisure.<br/>  Ultimate widescreen viewing<br/> VAIO AW-Series offers the ultimate in big screen multimedia entertainment with a revolutionary 18.4” real wide display. With its large size, Full HD 1920x1080 (WUXGA) or 1680x945 (WXGA++) high resolution and true 16:9 aspect ratio, this new display offers the best possible digital media experience. Enjoy blockbuster movies with no or reduced black bars top and bottom. Pictures are perfectly true-to-life with up to 100% colour fidelity. The big LCD is also great for working on, allowing you to accommodate Windows Vista gadget bars and two full size Explorer windows side-by-side.<br/> The flagship VGN-AW11XU (RXU) provides the ultimate screen experience with Full HD1080 high resolution for watching HD movies at their true native resolution of 1080p and a Triluminous LED Screen with Full Adobe colour scan. Perfect for photo editing using advanced Adobe Photoshop Lightroom software supplied.<br/>  Sharp and bright pictures<br/> X-black technology ensures pictures are sharp, bright and natural looking with vibrant colour and depth. Most models feature a double lamp to give even deeper blacks, brighter whites and intense contrast for amazing realism. An anti-reflective coating minimizes glare and allows you to watch your entertainment outside cafes or in the garden.<br/>  Advanced editing with Adobe software <br/> World famous Adobe software is included to help you edit photos and create multimedia slideshows. The suite includes renowned Adobe Photoshop Lightroom software, a professional still picture editing package that allows you to truly take your photos to the next level.<br/>  Cutting edge NVIDIA graphics<br/> As you would expect from a full entertainment laptop, VAIO AW-Series includes cutting edge NVIDIA GeForce graphics. The VGN-AW11XU and VGN-AW11Z feature the extreme performance 9600M GT graphics card with 512MB dedicated VRAM for serious 3D decoding. All other models feature the 9300M GS graphics card with 256MB dedicated VRAM. Ideal for watching movies, playing games and creating powerful multimedia presentations.<br/> Both cards include PureVideo HD, essential for enjoying high definition entertainment, as well as hardware acceleration of MPEG2 HD movie formats, HDMI support and Direct X 10.<br/> One of the big advantages of NVIDIA GeForce 9000 Series graphics cards is that they take over the decoding process from the processor for best possible 3D performance.<br/>  Faster boot-up and file access<br/> The VGN-AW11XU (RXU) includes an integrated 128GB SSD. This solid state flash drive features no moving parts, allowing for faster system boot up and file access. It’s also a lot quieter than conventional drives and significantly enhances productivity on the move.<br/>  Ultimate connectivity<br/> Connect up with a wide range of peripheral products and equipment. AW-series features a variety of essential ports including S-Video output for playing photo slideshows or PAL resolution video through televisions, HDMI output for watching full 1080p HD movies on HD Ready TVs and i.LINK™ for connecting to digital camcorders, PCs and external hard drives. There’s also VGA output for easy link up with projectors and external screens, an ExpressCard 34 slot and three USB 2.0 ports.<br/>  Advanced wireless communications<br/> Up-to-the-minute 802.11a/b/g/n (Draft-n) Wireless WAN offers fastest possible connection speeds and wide reception range. Easily communicate cable-free with a range of devices via Bluetooth.<br/>  Fully equipped with VAIO entertainment software<br/> Enjoy and create your own multimedia content with VAIO entertainment software :<br/>- VAIO Movie Story : Create amazing home videos with three easy steps.<br/>- Click to Disc : Burn and edit your own discs.<br/>- VAIO Media Plus: Connect to your home network and enjoy digital content stored inside your VAIO.<br/>- VAIO Music Box: Play your favourite music according to your mood using the 12 tone analyser engine.

__Result.longdesc:
High Definition Entertainment
With a Blu-ray Disc Drive or Blu-ray Disc Combo Drive on all models, AW-Series is designed to take full advantage of a new era in High Definition entertainment. Most models feature an integrated Blu-ray Disc Drive with read and write capability. This allows high bandwidth playback of latest HD movies plus creation and editing of your own productions filmed on an HD camcorder.
You can also store up to 50GB of multimedia data on one disc using the Blu-ray Disc Drive, as well as play and record all CD and DVD formats.
Home Theater Sound Quality
Enjoy superb 2.1 channel sound performance with the VAIO AW-Series. These VAIOs feature an integrated subwoofer for impressive bass, specially designed PC speakers for natural mid to high frequency sound and an on board Sound Reality Chip.
Also featured is Dolby Home Theatre for powerful virtual surround. Dolby Home Theater includes advanced audio technologies to place you right at the heart of the action for a true cinema-at-home experience. Optical out sockets allow easy connection to Home Cinema systems.
Watch & record TV
Enjoying all your favourite TV programmes is effortless with the VGN-AW11XU (RXU). This model features an integrated hybrid digital and analogue TV tuner with remote control for convenient television viewing on your laptop. Watch, record and store analogue or high quality digital terrestrial TV programmes.
Search available stations for favourite shows and record them while you’re out. If you come back before the show has finished, you can start watching while your AW-Series continues recording. Using multimedia features in Windows Vista, organise and manage all your recorded TV shows and enjoy them at your leisure.
Ultimate widescreen viewing
VAIO AW-Series offers the ultimate in big screen multimedia entertainment with a revolutionary 18.4” real wide display. With its large size, Full HD 1920x1080 (WUXGA) or 1680x945 (WXGA++) high resolution and true 16:9 aspect ratio, this new display offers the best possible digital media experience. Enjoy blockbuster movies with no or reduced black bars top and bottom. Pictures are perfectly true-to-life with up to 100% colour fidelity. The big LCD is also great for working on, allowing you to accommodate Windows Vista gadget bars and two full size Explorer windows side-by-side.
The flagship VGN-AW11XU (RXU) provides the ultimate screen experience with Full HD1080 high resolution for watching HD movies at their true native resolution of 1080p and a Triluminous LED Screen with Full Adobe colour scan. Perfect for photo editing using advanced Adobe Photoshop Lightroom software supplied.
Sharp and bright pictures
X-black technology ensures pictures are sharp, bright and natural looking with vibrant colour and depth. Most models feature a double lamp to give even deeper blacks, brighter whites and intense contrast for amazing realism. An anti-reflective coating minimizes glare and allows you to watch your entertainment outside cafes or in the garden.
Advanced editing with Adobe software
World famous Adobe software is included to help you edit photos and create multimedia slideshows. The suite includes renowned Adobe Photoshop Lightroom software, a professional still picture editing package that allows you to truly take your photos to the next level.
Cutting edge NVIDIA graphics
As you would expect from a full entertainment laptop, VAIO AW-Series includes cutting edge NVIDIA GeForce graphics. The VGN-AW11XU and VGN-AW11Z feature the extreme performance 9600M GT graphics card with 512MB dedicated VRAM for serious 3D decoding. All other models feature the 9300M GS graphics card with 256MB dedicated VRAM. Ideal for watching movies, playing games and creating powerful multimedia presentations.
Both cards include PureVideo HD, essential for enjoying high definition entertainment, as well as hardware acceleration of MPEG2 HD movie formats, HDMI support and Direct X 10.
One of the big advantages of NVIDIA GeForce 9000 Series graphics cards is that they take over the decoding process from the processor for best possible 3D performance.
Faster boot-up and file access
The VGN-AW11XU (RXU) includes an integrated 128GB SSD. This solid state flash drive features no moving parts, allowing for faster system boot up and file access. It’s also a lot quieter than conventional drives and significantly enhances productivity on the move.
Ultimate connectivity
Connect up with a wide range of peripheral products and equipment. AW-series features a variety of essential ports including S-Video output for playing photo slideshows or PAL resolution video through televisions, HDMI output for watching full 1080p HD movies on HD Ready TVs and i.LINK™ for connecting to digital camcorders, PCs and external hard drives. There’s also VGA output for easy link up with projectors and external screens, an ExpressCard 34 slot and three USB 2.0 ports.
Advanced wireless communications
Up-to-the-minute 802.11a/b/g/n (Draft-n) Wireless WAN offers fastest possible connection speeds and wide reception range. Easily communicate cable-free with a range of devices via Bluetooth.
Fully equipped with VAIO entertainment software
Enjoy and create your own multimedia content with VAIO entertainment software :
- VAIO Movie Story : Create amazing home videos with three easy steps.
- Click to Disc : Burn and edit your own discs.
- VAIO Media Plus: Connect to your home network and enjoy digital content stored inside your VAIO.
- VAIO Music Box: Play your favourite music according to your mood using the 12 tone analyser engine.
__Result.longdesc2: Sony A VAIO VGN-AW31M/H. Processor family: Intel® Core™2 Duo, Processor model: P8700, Processor frequency: 2.53 GHz. Display diagonal: 46.7 cm (18.4"), HD type: WSXGA+, Display resolution: 1680 x 945 pixels. Internal memory: 4 GB, Internal memory type: DDR2-SDRAM. Total storage capacity: 500 GB. Discrete graphics adapter. Operating system installed: Windows Vista Home Premium. Product colour: Grey. Weight: 3.9 kg

Intel® Clear Video HD Technology (Intel® CVT HD)
Intel® Clear Video Technology for Mobile Internet Devices (Intel CVT for MID)
Intel® Hyper Threading Technology (Intel® HT Technology)
